actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide for State and area volunteer services coordinators.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to allow area agencies on aging to provide for an area volunteer services coordinator and to require State agencies on aging to provide for a State volunteer services coordinator if 50 percent or more of the area plans in the State provide for an area volunteer services coordinator.

titles.title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide for State and area volunteer services coordinators.
